articles.author: Alasdair Fotheringham
articles.title: Paris-Roubaix: Mathieu van der Poel secures second consecutive victory with 60km solo attack - Cyclingnews
articles.description: World Champion dominates in fastest-ever Hell of the North, 1-2 for Alpecin-Deceuninck as Jasper Philipsen wins chase-group sprint for second and Mads Pedersen third
articles.content: Reigning World Champion Mathieu van der Poel (Alpecin-Deceuninck) scorched home solo to a second successive victory in the fastest-ever edition of Paris-Roubaix, simultaneously becoming the first rid… [+11211 chars]
